MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 29-DEC-2020 11:47.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Connahs Quay, affecting properties in Snowdon Avenue, Barmouth Close, Beaumaris Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:47 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  9:43 am on 29th December, 2020.
